actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to establish, within the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, an integrated and comprehensive ocean, coastal, Great Lakes, and atmospheric research and environmental information sharing program to support renewable energy, and for other purposes.
short_title: Renewable Energy Environmental Research Act of 2014

titles.title: Renewable Energy Environmental Research Act of 2014

A bill to establish, within the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, an integrated and comprehensive ocean, coastal, Great Lakes, and atmospheric research and environmental information sharing program to support renewable energy, and for other purposes.
